mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.kana, u.email, u.image, r.id as role_id, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN role_users ru ON u.id = ru.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ru.role_id = r.id
SELECT id, name, kana, email, image, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, kana, email, password, image, created_at, updated_at, is_active) VALUES (#{name}, #{kana}, #{email}, #{password}, #{image}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, true)
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, kana = #{kana}, email= #{email}, password = #{password}, image = #{image}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
